alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gallia and west central Mason Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rio Grande, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gallipolis, Rio Grande, Henderson, Adamsville, Gage and Gallopolis Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
